title: Systematic Attacks on Black Women
summary: Trump repeatedly used 'low IQ' attacks against Black people, a trope that race scholars note plays into historical racist narratives used to justify slavery and deny Black Americans full humanity.
keyFacts: Rep. Maxine Waters: 'Extraordinarily low IQ person,' 'crazy,' 'unhinged'
Omarosa Manigault Newman: Called 'that dog,' 'crazed, crying lowlife,' 'wacky and deranged'
April Ryan: 'Nasty,' 'loser,' 'doesn't know what the hell she's doing'
Abby Phillip (CNN): 'Stupid question' when asking about his loss in 2018 elections
LeBron James & Don Lemon: 'Dumbest man on television' who 'made Lebron look smart, which isn't easy to do'
Experts: Comparing Omarosa to 'dog' plays into narrative of 'questioning whether or not blacks are truly human beings' used to justify slavery

sources.text: Critical race theory scholars quoted in Washington Post, CNN
